suggestions.original: To improve the line texture in the artwork, consider incorporating more varied and intricate line work. For example, adding finer details to the butterflies' wings, the clouds, and the flowers can enhance the visual interest. Experiment with different line weights and styles to create depth and dimension. Additionally, refining the outlines of the figures and elements can contribute to a more sophisticated and polished look. Using techniques such as cross-hatching or stippling can also add texture and richness to the piece.
